pages.text: The $(item)Brick Kiln$() is used for $(thing)Composite Smelting$() recipes to produce items from two ingredients.
However, to get your first $(thing)Cyan Bricks$() to make the kiln, you have to use the traditional method.

pages.title: Making Cyan Brick
pages.text: To make $(item)Cyan Brick$(), smelt $(item)Unfired Clay Brick$() into $(item)Fired Brick$(), then drop it into water and wait for 5 minutes.

pages.title: Using Brick Kiln
pages.text: The $(item)Brick Kiln$() is similar to a furnace, but 2 input items are needed instead of one. Recipes can be looked up in JEI.
